alert.note: Alert for Northwest Blue Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 10:26PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Walla Walla and south central Columbia Counties through 1100 PM PDT... At 1026 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ski Bluewood, or 17 miles south of Dayton, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ski Bluewood and Kooskooskie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
